Title.language: Doxology for the Presentation of the Lord Christ in the Temple

language.div: Doksologi untuk Pesta Persembahan Tuhan Kristus di Bait Allah

Title.language: ذوكصولوجية لعيد دخول السيد إلى الهيكل بأورشليم

comment.language: For the Feast of the Presentation of the Lord Christ in the Temple:

language.div: Untuk Perayaan Persembahan Tuhan Kristus di Bait Suci:

text.language: Apeno#c# I/#c# P,#c#: piw~ou vwf nem pihumnoc: nem Pefiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip#n#a# m~parakl/ton.
Our Lord Jesus Christ, glory and praise be to Him, with His good Father, and the Spirit of Comfort.

language.div: Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus, segala kemuliaan dan pujian bagi-Nya, beserta Bapa yang baik, dan Roh Penghibur yang kudus.

text.language: ربنا يسوع المسيح له المجد والتسبيح مع أبيه الصالح والروح المعزى.
I~ e~qoun e~piervei e#y#u#: e~jen nenjij n~tefmau: menenca h~me n~e~hoou: m~pefjinmici e#y#u#.
He entered the holy temple, on His mother's hands, after forty days, from His holy Birth.

language.div: Ia masuk ke Bait Suci, dalam pelukan bunda-Nya, setelah empat puluh hari, sejak kelahiran-Nya yang kudus.

text.language: دخل إلى الهيكل المقدس على يدى أمه بعد أربعين يوماً من مولده المقدس.
Afi~ n~je Iwc/f pidikeoc: nem Maria y~mau m~P,#c#: auyamio~ m~p~jwk m~pinomoc: eybe pia~lou n~cwt/r I/#c#.
Joseph the Righteous came, with Mary the Mother of Christ, they followed the law, for the boy Jesus the Savior.

language.div: Yusuf yang benar datang, bersama Maria, Bunda Kristus, mereka taat hukum Taurat, bagi Yesus, Sang Juruselamat kecil.

text.language: جاء يوسف الصديق مع مريم أم المسيح وصنعا إتمام الناموس لأجل الصبى المخلص يسوع.
Afolf n~je Cumewn piou/b: e~jen nefjij e#y#u#: ouoh afhwc e~p~ouro P,#c#: m~pair/] efjw m~moc.
Simeon the Priest lifted Him, on his holy hands, and praised Christ the King, likewise saying.

language.div: Simeon sang imam mengangkat-Nya, dalam tangan kudusnya, memuji Kristus Sang Raja, sambil berkata demikian:

text.language: حمله سمعان الكاهن على يديه الطاهرتين وسبح الملك المسيح هكذا قائلا.
}nou pan/b ,~na,a pekbwk: e~bol qen ouhir/n/ kata pekcaji: je aunau n~je nabal e~peknohem: v/e~takcebtwtf m~pem~yo n~nilaoc.
"Lord now You are letting Your servant depart, in peace according to Your word, for my eyes have seen Your salvation, which You have prepared before the face of the people.

language.div: “Tuhan, kini biarlah hamba-Mu pergi, dengan damai menurut firman-Mu, sebab mataku lihat keselamatan-Mu, yang telah Kau sediakan di hadapan segala bangsa.”

text.language: الآن ياسيد تطلق عبدك بسلام كقولك لأن عينى قد أبصرتا خلاصك الذى أعددته قدام الشعوب.
Tenhwc e~rof ten]w~ou naf: tenerhouo~ [ici m~mof: hwc a~gayoc ouoh m~mairwmi: nai nan kata peknis] n~nai.
We praise and glorify Him, and exalt Him above all, as the Good One and Lover of Mankind, have mercy upon us according to Your great mercy.

language.div: Kami puji dan muliakan Dia, dan tinggikan di atas segalanya, sebagai Yang Baik dan Pengasih manusia, kasihanilah kami seturut belas kasih-Mu yang besar.

text.language: نسبحه ونمجده ونزيده رفعة كصالح ومحب البشر إرحمنا كعظيم رحمتك.
